attributes.action: Worldwide moritorium on Payment of Banker Bonuses
attributes.additional_details: Request a coordinated worldwide central bank move to influence restraint in all excessive/regular bonuses taken by bankers from profits generated from other peoples, money borrowed at rock bottom interest rates.......the bankers themselves have failed over past 3 years to recognise their incongruous reward structure....and major financial services shareholders in the banks have failed to moderate their excesses, as have the remuneration committees and individual governments operating in isolation through their tax policies.
